name: back-it-up
short_description: This is a project still in developing and testing mode.  Everything is hard codeed but will soon be availble with configuration files.  It is a scriupt to generate bacups on linux with the tar, mtx, and mt command.  Everything is automated with menus.  A php web interface is also in development with a mysql db instead of log files.  Script is presently in developing so It is written so I may understand it.  I will soon upload a new file which will be much cleaner and easier to read to modify.
summary: Automation of backups with mtx and mt commande
